keys.value: A fish that can only be caught in Summer.
An uncommon fish that can only be caught in Summer. It has copper scales.
A rare fish that can only be caught in Summer. It has silver scales.
A legendary fish that can only be caught in Summer. It has golden scales.

<UI_Y>How to obtain:</UI_Y> <UI_G>Various Events</UI_G>
It is a piece that contains the power of the Masked Tavor. You can obtain the familiar <UI_G> Masked Tavor</UI_G> by combining the pieces.

<UI_Y>How to obtain:</UI_Y> <UI_G>Various Events</UI_G>
It is a piece that resembles a white hamster. You can obtain the familiar <UI_G> White Hamster</UI_G> by combining the pieces.

<UI_Y>How to obtain:</UI_Y> <UI_G>Various Events</UI_G>
It is a piece that resembles a striped hamster. You can obtain the familiar <UI_G> Striped Hamster</UI_G> by combining the pieces.
A essência do poder dos draconianos <UI_Y>Obtido de:</UI_Y> <UI_G>Refúgio dos Draconianos</UI_G> Material necessário para criação <font color="ef0c63">Mítica</font>.
A essência do poder do Frio <UI_Y>Obtido de:</UI_Y> <UI_G>Refúgio dos Draconianos</UI_G> Material necessário para criação <font color="ef0c63">Mítica</font>.

This essence contains the power of the ancient Dragon God's. <UI_Y>How to obtain:</UI_Y> <UI_G>- Dragon God Hideout</UI_G> Material required for<font color="#ef0c63"> Bloodless Weapon Awakening </font>and Cold-Blooded Leviathan Mark crafting.

This essence contains the power of Folcierra, the Stormcaller Dragon. <UI_Y>How to obtain:</UI_Y> <UI_G>- Dragon God Hideout</UI_G> Material required for <font color="#ef0c63">Mythical Grade </font>crafting.

<UI_Y>Found In:</UI_Y> <UI_G>Draconians' Hideout</UI_G>
<UI_Y>A draconian loot, used to craft the emblem needed to tame <UI_G>Cold-blooded Fabulion</UI_G></UI_Y>

<UI_Y>Found In:</UI_Y> <UI_G>Draconians' Hideout</UI_G>
<UI_Y>A draconian loot, used to craft the emblem needed to tame <UI_G>Cold-blooded Fabulion</UI_G>.</UI_Y>

<UI_Y>How to obtain:</UI_Y> <UI_G>Various Events</UI_G>
It is a piece that continas the energy of the Fleeting Eclipse. You can obtain the familiar <UI_G> Fleeting Eclipse</UI_G> by combining the pieces.

Used to craft Fireworks I (EXP Boost).
Can be obtained from Snowmen inside the dungeons during the Divine Anniversary Event.

Used to craft Fireworks II (Droprate Boost).
Can be obtained from Snowmen inside the dungeons during the Divine Anniversary Event.

Used to craft Fireworks III (Combat Stat Boost).
Can be obtained from Snowmen inside the dungeons during the Divine Anniversary Event.

Used to craft Fireworks.
Can be obtained from Skan Bombers at the Sea of Hakanas during the Divine Anniversary Event.

Used to craft Fireworks.
Can be obtained from Pirates at the Pirate Hideout in Parnas Coast during the Divine Anniversary Event.

Used to craft Fireworks.
Can be obtained from Treants near the Dragon Knight Camp in Ellora's Sanctuary during the Divine Anniversary Event.

An even sturdier alloy embedded with some runic script.
Craftsmaster Blueton created those for you and told you to hold onto them for later.
You should gather some more of these!

Magic infused gear cogs for some sort of machine?
Blueton gave you those and he said to keep them. You will need them later!

After Blueton assembled all the golem heart fragments you brought him, this is what came out of it.
It is brimming with power that seems to last forever.

How to obtain:
- Exchange Infused Awakened Emblem (Seratia – Awakened Bosses Daily quests) at Belhira in Hakain's Crossing
A material needed to craft the Awakened Divine armor set.

How to obtain:
- Exchange Overcomer of Challenges Token (3-Man Spire Floor 20 daily quest)
A material needed to craft the Awakened Divine armor set.

How to obtain:
- Exchange Supreme Ruler Emblem (John MacBain – Oruun Quest) at Belhira in Hakain's Crossing
A material needed to craft the Awakened Divine armor set.

How to obtain:
- Exchange Infused Awakened Emblem (Seratia – Awakened Bosses Daily quests) at Belhira in Hakain's Crossing
A material needed to craft the Awakened Divine armor set.

How to obtain:

A material needed to craft the Awakened Divine armor set.

How to obtain:
Armor Crafting
A material needed to craft the Awakened Divine armor set.
Crafting recipe can be purchased from Seratia.

How to obtain:
- 3-Man Spire party-rewards (Floor 15 & 20)
A material needed to craft Divine Energy Shards.

A small box containing 500 Ellun.
Needed for the exchange quest to obtain Polished Divine Tempering Stones, that are used to temper the Awakened Divine armor set.
Can be purchased from Seratia.

A medium-sized box containing 1000 Ellun.
Needed for the exchange quest to obtain Shining Divine Tempering Stones, that are used to temper the Awakened Divine armor set.
Can be purchased from Seratia.

A large box containing 1500 Ellun.
Needed for the exchange quest to obtain Brilliant Divine Tempering Stones, that are used to temper the Awakened Divine armor set.
Can be purchased from Seratia.

How to obtain:
- Awakened Dungeon Boss Drops & NPC Shop
- Oruun drops (Stygaea)
- 3-Man Spire rewards (Floor 20)
A material needed to craft Infused Divine Alloys.

Armor Crafting
A material needed to craft the Awakened Divine armor set.
Crafting recipe can be purchased from Seratia.

A material needed to craft the Awakened Divine armor set.

- Worldboss Oruun drops

A material needed to craft Raw Divine Tempering Stones.

How to obtain:
Alchemy Crafting
A material needed the exchange quest to obtain Divine Tempering Stones, that are used for the Awakened Divine armor set.
Crafting recipe can be purchased from Seratia.

Gather 4 of these and bring them so Belhira in Hakains Crossing to combine them to an Awakened Alkanin Essence, that is used to craft the powerful Awakened Divine armor set.

How to obtain:
- Exchange Divine Alkanin Crescent at Seratia

A piece of fabric, giving off a creepy feeling. It seems to have been used in some sort of forbidden ritual to summon Death himself.
